id1.text: It’s so nice to see you again, I wasn’t sure if I would or not! But it’s nice to have the cat out of the bag- or… box?

id2.text: You get it! I hate waiting like that, I’m terrible at sitting still… do you ever feel like that? Sort of restless?

id3.text: I just mean that I hate waiting like that, I’m terrible at sitting still… do you ever feel like that? Sort of restless?

id4.text: I hate waiting like that, I’m terrible at sitting still… do you ever feel like that? Sort of restless?

id5.text: That’s really interesting, I love how people can be so different. And yet, we fit together so well…

id6.text: No, really, I love how people can be so different. And yet, we can still fit together…

id7.text: No, really, I love how people can be so different. And yet, we can still fit together…

id8.text: That’s interesting, I love how people can be so different. And yet, we fit together so well…

id9.text: A great pair: someone who wins big teddy bears, and someone who is one. Careful though, that might make you a good pincushion for kitty claws!

id10.text: Well, it could make a nice pair: someone who wins big teddy bears, and someone who is one. Careful though, that might make you a good pincushion for kitty claws.

id11.text: Well, it could make a nice pair: someone who wins big teddy bears, and someone who is one. Careful though, that might make you a good pincushion for kitty claws.

id12.text: A nice pair: someone who wins big teddy bears, and someone who is one. Careful though, that might make you a good pincushion for kitty claws!

id13.text: Hehe, of course. I could never scratch you up though, we don’t want to damage that pretty face!

id14.text: Oh no, of course I’d never scratch you! Especially not that pretty face, haha.

id15.text: Oh no, of course I’d never scratch you! Especially not that pretty face, haha.

id16.text: Hehe, of course. I could never scratch you up though, we don’t want to damage that pretty face!

id17.text: I’m glad I got to see it again. And maybe I could keep seeing it…? We can combine our powers to get teddy a friend next time!

id18.text: I mean it, I’m glad I got to see it again. And maybe I could keep seeing it…? We can combine our powers to get teddy a friend, if there’s a next time.

id19.text: I’m glad I got to see it again. And maybe I could keep seeing it…? We can combine our powers to get teddy a friend next time…
